topics.body:
Uh hey guys, I gotta threatening message out of the blue from someone I don't know, calling me to call them back or something would happen. 
I'm not sure if I should report this to the police, or just ignore it.
topics.author: 5046d66d7f123b38980018c6

topics.body:
"@Evident Disaster":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/543b464c636872524bcb0100#post_543b464c636872524bcb0100

where did you got it from?

you can ip track the anon (if it was an anon) and send his location to the police.
topics.author: 5154c5237f123bcd580002fc

topics.body:
"@Evident Disaster":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/543b464c636872524bcb0100#post_543b464c636872524bcb0100
if you think it's actually serious
yes tell someone
if not the police then someone you can trust to take it seriously
topics.author: 4fe3df367f123b517900066a

topics.body:
"@twistedmetalero":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/543b469b6368724426510100#post_543b469b6368724426510100

"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/543b46e06368725ca9500000#post_543b46e06368725ca9500000

Okay well I'll use my best judgement, I don't think its anyone I know, it might just be some random douche bag randomly messaging threatening messages over the place. This isn't the first time this sort of thing has happened, I've gotten random drunk dials in the past.
topics.author: 5046d66d7f123b38980018c6

topics.body:
"@Evident Disaster":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/543b464c636872524bcb0100#post_543b464c636872524bcb0100
